member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.Polling
member.summary: Gets/sets a value indicating whether the polling is executing via the URL of the current page (true), or if it uses OboutInc.UploadProgressHandler.aspx defined in Web.config file (false).

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.PreservePlace
member.summary: Gets/sets a value indicating whether to preserve space for the control, or insert it when progress is on.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.PreserveSpace
member.summary: Gets/sets a value indicating whether to preserve space for the control, or insert it when progress is on.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.ShowUploadedFiles
member.summary: Gets/sets a value indicating whether to show uploaded files list inside this Control, or do not show them.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.IgnoreStatusPanel
member.summary: Gets/sets a value indicating whether to ignore StatusPanel controls and do full postback when no files to upload, or do partial postback for the StatusPanel controls.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.RefreshPeriod
member.summary: Gets/sets refresh period for getting current uploading status.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.OnClientProgressRefreshed
member.summary: Gets/sets the client-side function called on every UploadFileProgress refreshing.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.OnClientProgressStopped
member.summary: Gets/sets the client-side function called before UploadFileProgress closed.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.FormClientID
member.summary: Gets/sets the client ID of the Form where File Uploading Progress should be registered.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.OnClientProgressStarted
member.summary: Gets/sets the client-side function called before UploadFileProgress opened.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.OnClientSubmitting
member.summary: Gets/sets the client-side function called on Form submitting.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.OnClientFileRejected
member.summary: Gets/sets the client-side function called on file rejected (size limitation).

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.OnClientFileCleared
member.summary: Gets/sets the client-side function called on file cleared (Extension limitation).

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.OnClientServerException
member.summary: Gets/sets the client-side function called on Server-side exception.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.LocalizationFile
member.summary: Gets/sets the relative path of the Localization File.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.StyleFile
member.summary: Gets/sets the relative path of the Style File.

member.name: P:OboutInc.FileUpload.FileUploadProgress.InnerFiles
member.summary: Gets/sets a value indicating whether to use Inner Files.
